name: apa
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for Asian Pacific American: a person living in the United States whose family originally comes from the Far East, Southeast Asia, South Asia, or the Pacific Islands: Asian Pacific American (APA) is a term sometimes used in the United States to include both Asian Americans and Pacific Islander Americans. The goal of the initiative is to improve and expand the curriculum so that it more aptly reflects the contribution of APA culture and history. Synonyms
AAPI
API (PERSON)
More examplesFewer examplesShe argues that the struggles of Pacific Islanders have not been included in APA discourses.She works at a center for APA women.APAs have a rich heritage going back thousands of years.
